Python DSL

(https://github.com/quantumlib/Cirq/blob/36aa495843707f6483d1acdf113e9ffcb8499c5c/docs/dev/serialization.md)
Interop with https://github.com/strilanc/quirk

QML.notes: Haskell DSL, part of a thesis

notes: No source export, only runtime object conversion
No Pauli Y, Ry, CRZ, CH
No custom gates, barriers, resets and conditionals
Only Pauli XYZ, H,S,T, Rx,Ry,Rz, U1,U2,U3, CX, CNOT, CZ, SWAP
Only CCNOT, CNOT, CSWAP, CPHASE, CPHASE00, CPHASE01, CPHASE10, CZ, PHASE, H, I, ISWAP, PSWAP, RX, RY, RZ, S, SWAP, T, X, Y, Z, XY
Only CCNOT, CNOT, CSWAP, CPHASE, CPHASE00, CPHASE01, CPHASE10, CZ, PHASE, H, I, ISWAP, PSWAP, RX, RY, RZ, S, SWAP, T, X, Y, Z, XY
Only components which are quil compatible (e.g. no if statements)
Only linear version, no branching / functions / etc.
Only Pauli X,Z, Rx, Rz, H, S, T, CNOT, CZ, CCZ, TOF gates
from Quirk to Cirq object, then from Cirq to OpenQASM 2
No support for Braket CPhaseShift00, CPhaseShift01, CPhaseShift10, PSwap
